mil7.4.6:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘akasassa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.6:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbaso kilesehi agayhena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.6:1.4: Idam, maharaja, akasassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.6:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ‘aniccam dukkham anatta’ti sankharesu manasam sancarayitabbam.
mil7.4.6:2.3: Idam, maharaja, akasassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.6:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbabhavapatisandhisu manasam ubbejayitabbam, assado na katabbo.
mil7.4.6:3.3: Idam, maharaja, akasassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.6:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, akaso ananto appamano aparimeyyo;
mil7.4.6:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena anantasilena aparimitananena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.6:4.3: Idam, maharaja, akasassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.6:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, akaso alaggo asatto appatitthito apalibuddho;
mil7.4.6:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kule gane labhe avase palibodhe paccaye sabbakilesesu ca sabbattha alaggena bhavitabbam, anasattena appatitthitena apalibuddhena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.6:5.3: Idam, maharaja, akasassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.6:5.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena sakam puttam rahulam ovadantena—
mil7.4.6:6.2: evameva kho tvam, rahula, akasasamam bhavanam bhavehi.
mil7.4.6:6.3: Akasasamam hi te, rahula, bhavanam bhavayato uppanna manapamanapa phassa cittam pariyadaya thassanti’”ti.
